title: Jummah tul Wida? The last Friday of Ramadan | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: uh zilkar from bangladesh says what is jumatul wada the farewell friday to my knowledge this is an innovated name given to the last friday in ramadan so sometimes you have four fridays sometimes you have five fridays the last friday of ramadan they call it the farewell friday and in some countries such in the subcontinent they would gather and travel the distances to gather in a masjid and celebrate and do this and do that all of this is an innovation it has no basis none whatsoever for it in islam
